original_text: He did not remove the altars on the hills. The people continued to offer sacrifices and to burn incense on those altars.
korean_text: 오직 산당들을 제거하지 아니하였으므로 백성이 여전히 산당에서 제사를 드리며 분향하였더라

sentences.original_text: He did not remove the altars on the hills
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 언덕에 있는 제단들을 제거하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: The people continued to offer sacrifices
and to burn incense on those altars
